schema.title: Crowdfund Embeddable
schema.description: Configurations for publishing this crowdfund ADO App into an embeddable.

crowdfund.title: Crowdfund Address
crowdfund.description: Enter the address of the Crowdfund component you wish to display in your embeddable.

cw721.title: CW721 Address
cw721.description: Enter the address of the CW721 ADO which minted the specific CW721 NFT Token you wish to display on your embeddable

name.title: Collection Name
name.description: Assign a name to the NFT Collection you intend to sell. This name will be visible on the embeddable itself.

twitter.title: Twitter URL
twitter.description: (Optional) Twitter url for this embeddable. Must begin with https://

featured.title: Featured Token Id
featured.description: The Token ID of the CW721 NFT token(s) which you wish to display in this embeddable.
